weekly_top_story.headline: UN Security Council adopts US resolution advancing Gaza peace plan
weekly_top_story.summary: A landmark UN Security Council resolution backed by the US and several global powers marks a historic step toward Palestinian self-determination and a potential end to the Gaza crisis, signaling a shift in international diplomacy.

stories.headline: Trump eliminates tariffs on key food imports amid inflation concerns
stories.summary: President Trump rolled back tariffs on major food imports like beef, coffee, and tropical fruits, aiming to lower consumer prices and address rising inflation following a recent government shutdown.

stories.headline: Vatican returns 62 Indigenous artifacts to Canada after 100 years
stories.summary: The Vatican has formally agreed to return 62 Indigenous artifacts to Canada, marking a significant step in reconciliation and cultural restitution efforts.

stories.headline: Russia-Ukraine conflict escalates with major drone and missile strikes
stories.summary: Russia launched massive drone and missile attacks on Kyiv, killing at least six, while Ukraine retaliated with strikes on Russian oil facilities, intensifying the ongoing energy war.
